rail_info: Set this number to how far a redstone signal can power copper rails.
pulsar_info: Set this number to the range at which the pulsar can pick up items/xp orbs
pan_info: The values below determine the chance for items to be sifted in the copper pan. Each value must be in 0.#F form and it's recommended that all values add up to less than or equal to 1.0
